item.title: Testing Domain Controller Connectivity (using PowerShell)
item.description: I believe that the best way to improve your skill is to test and push yourself. I am currently on a mission to get a lot more comfortable with PowerShell ( as it lives up to its name, it is very POWERful). I need to check a few domains up and running and like to keep an eye on my Domain Controllers as they are obviously the base of Active Directory.
